title: Weresisters
description: Werewolf sisters separated at birth. One is sheltered. The other is out for blood… Sixteen-year-old Kyra can't remember anything before the age of ten. If she could get her memories back, she might have an explanation for her torn up leg or her ability to "mind-speak" with her adoptive father. All she wants to do is climb the popularity ladder at school, but life always seems to have other plans. When she transforms into a werewolf, Kyra must fend off a deadly madman who threatens her father, her newly discovered family, and the werewolf pack. She might succeed, as long as she can control the beast within… Selene has it all. She's a punk-rocker who leads the meanest gang in school, not to mention she's a badass werewolf. When she kills a human and unleashes the murderous rage of her bloodlust, she runs away, terrified of what she might become. Far from home and surrounded by killer werewolves, Selene must find a way to regain her humanity before her bloodlust turns her into a violent, mindless beast. And she'll need to do it quickly. Because someone, or something, is following her… Weresisters is a YA fantasy novel featuring a new take on the werewolf genre. If you like three-dimensional characters, supernatural action, and thrilling paranormal fantasy, then you'll love this violent, original werewolf tale. Buy Weresisters to get your supernatural fix today!
author: Shelley Stoehr
